sql.select_pptn_sql: SELECT STCD, TM, Z, Q FROM ST_RIVER_R WHERE TM > TO_DATE(:f1<char[32]>, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TM <= TO_DATE(:f2<char[32]>, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') ORDER BY STCD;
sql.select_stbprp_sql_bak: SELECT  STCD, STNM, RVNM, HNNM, BSNM, LGTD, LTTD, STLC, ADDVCD, DTMNM, DTMEL, DTPR, STTP, FRGRD, ESSTYM, BGFRYM, ATCUNIT, ADMAUTH, LOCALITY, STBK, STAzt, DSTRVM, DRNA, PHCD, USFL, COMMENTS, MODITIME, HNNM0, ADCD, ADDVCD1 FROM ST_STBPRP_B;
sql.select_stbprp_sql: SELECT  STCD, STNM,  LGTD, LTTD FROM ST_STBPRP_B;
